data.name: Air - 2236 A.D. Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Air is original soundtrack to 2236 A.D.

This soundtrack contains 69 tracks across 4 CDs featuring music from 2236 A.D. Tracks are available in WAV format and also contain liner notes from the physical CD release.

Air -2236 A.D. Original Soundtrack-
Track List

DISC1
01 SOLVED9
02 Stream Of Consciousness
03 Skirt
04 convergence
05 repeat repeat(mini)*
06 remindful place
07 Minuet #1
08 Shion
09 Air2
10 Is it?
11 The Wayfarer
12 Minuet #3
13 Fluorescent Lamp
14 Violin
15 Haru
16 Ice Bug
17 Noise
18 Radio Noise
19 Knowing
20 Flow
21 silent place(mini)*
22 Kanon Yotsuba
23 Kanon Hime**
24 Kanon Shiraishi**
25 Flow2
26 KANON D-dur(from Akashic Records)**

DISC2
01 沈む (Sink)
02 Haru(Down)
03 Despair
04 gestaltzerfall(mini)*
05 I Wonder
06 Velocity
07 Genesis
08 Miserere
09 Toccata and Fugue in D minor, BWV 538
10 The Last Room
11 Klaviersonate Nr. 14 op. 27 Nr. 2 cis-moll _Quasi una Fantasia_ #1 Adagio sostenuto (attacca)
12 Klaviersonate Nr. 14 op. 27 Nr. 2 cis-moll _Quasi una Fantasia_ #3 Presto agitato
13 The Nutcracker**
14 Clair de Lune

DISC3
01 Emergence
02 Kanon(duet)**
03 Yrev
04 receptor
05 meltwater
06 洗濯機 (Washing Machine)
07 ともし火 (Torch)
08 帰り道 (Way Home)
09 blue
10 submergence
11 海底のアンサンブル (Ensemble of Sea Bed)
12 Y

DISC4
01 SOLVED6
02 みずのなかで (Among the Water) [feat. Momoka]
03 夏と透過光 (Summer, And Transmitted Light) [feat. Konako]
04 You're On The Round World
05 ラルゴ (Largo)
06 y
07 とても暗い部屋 (The Very Dark Room)
08 BGM3
09 Juliet
10 Precious
11 Msk Start
12 Suburban
13 i wonder
14 Sorroi
15 Air
16 sdrow
17 ことばの数だけ (As the Number of the Words)

*The track with the notation (mini) is partly excerpted from the original music because of the directing intention in the game.
**The track is arranged from the original music because of the directing intention in the game.
